main event: A witness in Trenton, Michigan, observed a bright blue light in the sky that changed direction and speed over a period of 10 minutes on March 14, 1966.
interesting points: The object was initially spotted moving from the west to the east at a high speed,The object rose to a high altitude when directly overhead and made a rapid reverse turn,The observer had seen the same object six weeks prior and described it similarly,The weather conditions were clear and cold at the time of the sighting,Conflicting data noted that the observer stated the object disappeared in one location and reappeared in another.
sighted object: a bright blue light in the sky
witness description: A 13-year-old male newspaper delivery boy who is a space enthusiast.
